_header: Now has Mary born a flower
Subjects: Virgin Mary, songs in honour of; hymns, to Virgin Mary
_description: Song to the Virgin Mary — two fragmentary stanzas

BLAdd5666.Transcription:
Now has mary born a flour all þis world to gret honour blissyd be
                    þat birth ayGood & man both was borne be tuyx anox anas
BLAdd5666.Note:
The manuscript is in the handwriting of Friar
                            John Brackley (f. 1v). Scribe wrote
                    ‘borne’ first then changed it to ‘both’.
